name: RTCInboundRtpStreamStats.pliCount
description: The pliCount property of the RTCInboundRtpStreamStats dictionary states the number of times the RTCRtpReceiver described by these statistics sent a Picture Loss Indication (PLI) packet to the sender.

refs.name: Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
refs.description: RTCInboundRtpStreamStats.pliCount - Identifiers for WebRTC's Statistics API
